= 'L10' THEN T1.CNTR_NO ELSE NULL END) AS SPAY_CNTR_CT , SUM(CASE WHEN T1.BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L10' THEN (T1.DLQ_AMT + T1.DLQ_ADD_AMT + T1.THM_CHRAM_AMT + T1.RSG_BOR_AMT) ELSE 0 END) AS SPAY_OBJ_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN T1.BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L10' THEN T1.DLQ_AMT + T1.DLQ_ADD_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SPAY_DLQ_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN T1.BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L10' THEN T1.THM_CHRAM_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SPAY_THM_CHRAM_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN T1.BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L10' THEN T1.DLQ_ADD_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SPAY_DLQ_ADD_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN T1.BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L10' THEN T1.RSG_BOR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SPAY_RSG_BOR_AMT FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS T1 --채권계약기본 Table LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 --계약상세 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN WHERE 1=1 AND T1.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} /* 기준년월 */ AND T1.BZ_HDQ_DV_CD = #{bzHdqDvCd} /* 사업부 구분 */ AND T1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_DV_CD = '02' /* 연체 상태의 채권만 대상 */ AND T1.CLCTAM_DV_CD = #{clctamDvCd} /* 집금구분 */
AND T1.BND_NW_DV_CD = #{bndNwDvCd} /* 신규구분 */
AND T1.CST_NO = #{cstNo} /* 고객번호 */

CLCTAM_PRTNR_KNM /* 집금 담당자명 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'CLCTAM_DV_CD', T4.CLCTAM_DV_CD) AS LSTMM_CLCTAM_DV_CD --전월 담당집금구분 , BF_CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /* 전월 담당자 번호 */ , (SELECT PRTNR_KNM FROM F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_BASE', 'CUJ_CD', T3.CUJ_CD) AS CUJ_NM --법원명 , T3.INDNO --사건번호 , T3.LWM_TP_CD /* 법조치유형 */ , T3.LWM_DTL_TP_CD /* 법조치상세 */ , T3.LWM_DT /* 법조치일자 */ , T3.DFLT_DT /* 채불등록일자 */ , (SELECT AND T3.FST_RGST_DTM = (SELECT MAX(ST2.FST_RGST_DTM) --고객의 법조치 내역 중 가장 최근값 조회 FROM TB_CBBO_BND_LWM_IZ ST2 WHERE ST2.CST_NO = T3.CST_NO AND ST2.CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND ST2.CNTR_SN = T3.CNTR_SN GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(T1.BASE_YM || '31','YYYYMMDD'),-1), 'YYYYMMDD') AND T4.BIZ_ENDDT >= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(T1.BASE_YM || '31','YYYYMMDD'),-1), 'YYYYMMDD') WHERE 1=1 AND T1.BASE_YM = AND T1.CST_NO = #{cstNo} /* 고객번호 */
